name: Mafia Watch
description:
MADE FOR APPLE WATCH
Mafia Watch is a Massively Multiplayer Social RPG made exclusively for the Apple Watch (Requires watchOS 2)

RULE THE MAFIA - BECOME THE DON
• Battle your way up the organization to become the Don
• Fight with and against other players to advance your career
• Collect & Protect the things you need to fulfill your destiny

NOTIFICATIONS DRIVE THE GAME
• A unique experience for the unique Apple Watch
• A tap on your wrist tells you everything :-
• Tap Tap - New Job...
• Tap Tap - Target in Range...
• Tap Tap - Revenge Request….
• Tap Tap - You’re Dead!

FEATURES & CONTENT
• Native Watch OS3 App with unique notification gameplay
• Hundreds of Jobs, Characters and Weapons
• Player vs. Player - Battle your friends to rise through the ranks
• Co-op - Team up with others to defeat powerful Bosses
• Infinitely Acquire/Upgrade your character and equipment
• Siri’s on your side - Taunt your foes and thank your friends with voice messaging.
• Connect to Facebook and bring your friends into the Mafia underworld
• Live Events & Content Updates!

SUPPORT
• Something not working? We want to help! Email us at support@n3twork.com
